sentences.english: Paralytic rabies accounts for about 30% of the total number of human cases.
sentences.chinese: 早瘫性狂犬病约占人类死亡病例总数的30%。

sentences.english: Children living in or visiting rabies-affected areas are at particular risk.
sentences.chinese: 在狂犬病疫区生活或停留的儿童面临的风险尤其高。

sentences.english: This article outlined the recent progresses in the research on pseudorabies .
sentences.chinese: 本文概述了近年来关于伪狂犬病的研究进展。

sentences.english: Objective To summary clinical characteristic of rabies and analyse misdiagnose reasons.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结狂犬病临床特征及误诊原因分析。

sentences.english: In dumb rabies there is a very short excitation phase .
sentences.chinese: 在狂犬病潜伏期，有一非常短的兴奋期。

sentences.english: Conclusion Adjuvant-free rabies vaccine showed good safety and immunogenicity.
sentences.chinese: 结论无佐剂狂犬病疫苗具有良好的安全性和免疫原性。

sentences.english: The rabid dog foamed at the mouth.
sentences.chinese: 那只狗染上狂犬病，口吐白沫。

sentences.english: These animals act as the reservoir for the rabies virus and for its continued spread.
sentences.chinese: 这些动物担当狂犬病毒的蓄水池并使他们继续传播。

sentences.english: They can transfer rabies and other diseases to other animals.
sentences.chinese: 它们可能将狂犬病等疾病传染给其他动物。

sentences.english: Animals with rabies often froth at the mouth.
sentences.chinese: 患狂犬病的动物经常口吐白沫。

sentences.english: Infected dogs and cats always die within a few days of showing symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 感染狂犬病的狗猫会在出现症状的几天之内死亡。

sentences.english: The customs agents destroyed the dog that was found to be rabid.
sentences.chinese: 海关消灭了被发现患有狂犬病的狗。

sentences.english: Rabies is the tenth most common cause of death due to infections in humans.
sentences.chinese: 狂犬病是人体感染造成死亡的第十最常见原因。

sentences.english: We could conclude that MMLS broad antimicrobial spectrum and good inhibiting effects on PRV.
sentences.chinese: MMLS具有广谱的抑菌作用和抗伪狂犬病毒作用。

sentences.english: They all had a history of rabid dog bite and typical clinical manifestations of rabies.
sentences.chinese: 各例患者均有病大咬伤史和狂犬病的典型临床症状。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the seroconversion rate of antibody after rabies vaccine inoculation and the its related factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨接种狂犬病疫苗后抗体阳转率及其相关因素。

definition: variant of 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
AIDS (loanword)/see also 愛滋病|爱滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
AIDS (loanword)/see also 愛滋病|爱滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
